00166 void MainWindow::openDesign(const VLNV& vlnv, const QString& viewName, bool forceUnlocked)
00167 {
00168 
00169         // the vlnv must always be for a component
00170         Q_ASSERT(libraryHandler_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::COMPONENT);
00171 
00172     // Check if the design is already open and activate it.
00173     if (vlnv.isValid()) {
00174         for (int i = 0; i < designTabs_->count(); i++) {
00175             DesignWidget *designWidget = dynamic_cast<DesignWidget*>(designTabs_->widget(i));
00176 
00177             if (designWidget != 0 && *designWidget->getOpenDocument() == vlnv) {
00178                 designTabs_->setCurrentIndex(i);
00179                 return;
00180             }
00181         }
00182     }
00183 
00184         // parse the referenced component
00185         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = libraryHandler_->getModel(vlnv);
00186         QSharedPointer<Component> comp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00187         QList<VLNV> hierRefs = comp->getHierRefs();
00188 
00189         // component must have at least one hierarchical reference
00190         //Q_ASSERT(!hierRefs.isEmpty());
00191 
00192         // make sure that all component's hierarchy refs are valid
00193         bool hadInvalidRefs = false;
00194         foreach (VLNV ref, hierRefs) {
00195 
00196                 // if the hierarchy referenced object is not found in library
00197                 if (!libraryHandler_->contains(ref)) {
00198                         emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 has hierarchical reference to object %2,"
00199                                 " which is not found in library. Component is not valid and can not "
00200                                 "be opened in design view. Edit component with component editor to "
00201                                 "remove invalid references.").arg(vlnv.toString(":")).arg(ref.toString(":")));
00202                         hadInvalidRefs = true;
00203                         continue;
00204                 }
00205 
00206                 // if the reference is to a wrong object type
00207                 else if (libraryHandler_->getDocumentType(ref) != VLNV::DESIGN &&
00208                         libraryHandler_->getDocumentType(ref) != VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION) {
00209                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 has hierarchical reference to object %2,"
00210                                         " which is not design or design configuration. Component is not valid and"
00211                                         " can not be opened in design view. Edit component with component editor to"
00212                                         " remove invalid references.").arg(vlnv.toString(":")).arg(ref.toString(":")));
00213                                 hadInvalidRefs = true;
00214                                 continue;
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 // if the reference is for a design configuration then check that also
00218                 // the design is found
00219                 else if (libraryHandler_->getDocumentType(ref) == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION) {
00220                         VLNV designVLNV = libraryHandler_->getDesignVLNV(ref);
00221 
00222                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp2 = libraryHandler_->getModel(ref);
00223                         QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf = libComp2.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
00224                         VLNV refToDesign = desConf->getDesignRef();
00225                         
00226                         // if the referenced design was not found in the library
00227                         if (!designVLNV.isValid()) {
00228                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 has hierarchical reference to object %2,"
00229                                         " which is design configuration and references to design %3. This "
00230                                         "design is not found in library so component can not be opened in "
00231                                         "design view. Edit component with component editor to remove "
00232                                         "invalid references").arg(
00233                                         vlnv.toString(":")).arg(
00234                                         ref.toString(":")).arg(
00235                                         refToDesign.toString(":")));
00236                                 hadInvalidRefs = true;
00237                                 continue;
00238                         }
00239                 }
00240         }
00241         // if there was at least one invalid reference then do not open the design
00242         if (hadInvalidRefs) {
00243                 return;
00244         }
00245 
00246     DesignWidget *designWidget = new DesignWidget(libraryHandler_, this);
00247 
00248     connect(designWidget->getEditProvider(), SIGNAL(editStateChanged()), this, SLOT(updateMenuStrip()));
00249     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(zoomChanged()), this, SLOT(updateZoomTools()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00250     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(modeChanged(DrawMode)),
00251             this, SLOT(onDrawModeChanged(DrawMode)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00252 
00253         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(destroyed(QObject*)),
00254                 this, SLOT(onClearItemSelection()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00255 
00256     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(openDesign(const VLNV&, const QString&)),
00257             this, SLOT(openDesign(const VLNV&, const QString&)));
00258         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(openComponent(const VLNV&)),
00259                 this, SLOT(openComponent(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00260     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(openBus(VLNV const&, VLNV const&, bool)),
00261             this, SLOT(openBus(VLNV const&, VLNV const&, bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00262         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(errorMsg(const QString&)),
00263                 console_, SLOT(onErrorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00264         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(noticeMsg(const QString&)),
00265                 console_, SLOT(onNoticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00266 
00267         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(clearItemSelection()),
00268                 libraryHandler_, SLOT(onClearSelection()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00269         
00270         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(componentSelected(ComponentItem*)),
00271                 this, SLOT(onComponentSelected(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00272      connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(interfaceSelected(DiagramInterface*)),
00273          this, SLOT(onInterfaceSelected(DiagramInterface*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00274         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(portSelected(DiagramPort*)),
00275                 this, SLOT(onPortSelected(DiagramPort*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00276         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(connectionSelected(DiagramInterconnection*)),
00277                 this, SLOT(onConnectionSelected(DiagramInterconnection*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00278 
00279         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(clearItemSelection()),
00280                 this, SLOT(onClearItemSelection()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00281 
00282         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(modifiedChanged(bool)),
00283                 actSave_, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00284 
00285         // open the design in the designWidget
00286         designWidget->setDesign(&vlnv, viewName);
00287 
00288         // if the design could not be opened
00289         if (!designWidget->getOpenDocument()) {
00290                 delete designWidget;
00291                 return;
00292         }
00293 
00294     if (forceUnlocked)
00295     {
00296         designWidget->setProtection(false);
00297     }
00298         else 
00299     {
00300                 // Open in unlocked mode by default only if the version is draft.
00301                 designWidget->setProtection(vlnv.getVersion() != "draft");
00302     }
00303 
00304     designWidget->setTabWidget(designTabs_);
00305 
00306     // A small hack to center the view correctly.
00307 //     designWidget->fitInView();
00308 //     designWidget->setZoomLevel(100);
00309 }

00312 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00313 // Function: openSWDesign()
00314 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00315 void MainWindow::openSWDesign(const VLNV& vlnv, bool forceUnlocked)
00316 {
00317     // Check if the SW design editor is already open and activate it.
00318     if (vlnv.isValid())
00319     {
00320         for (int i = 0; i < designTabs_->count(); i++)
00321         {
00322             IPXactComponentEditor* editor = dynamic_cast<IPXactComponentEditor*>(designTabs_->widget(i));
00323 
00324             if (editor && editor->getComponentVLNV() == vlnv)
00325             {
00326                 designTabs_->setCurrentIndex(i);
00327                 return;
00328             }
00329         }
00330     }
00331 
00332     // Editor was not yet open so create it.
00333     QSharedPointer<Component> component;
00334 
00335     if (libraryHandler_->contains(vlnv))
00336     {
00337         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = libraryHandler_->getModel(vlnv);
00338         component = libComp.dynamicCast<Component>();
00339     }
00340     else
00341     {
00342         emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in the library").arg(
00343             vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00344             vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00345             vlnv.getName()).arg(
00346             vlnv.getVersion()));
00347         return;
00348     }
00349 
00350     if (!component) {
00351         emit errorMessage(tr("Document type did not match Component"));
00352         return;
00353     }
00354 
00355     QString filePath = libraryHandler_->getPath(vlnv);
00356     QFileInfo info(filePath);
00357 
00358     SWDesignEditor* editor = new SWDesignEditor(this, this, libraryHandler_, component);
00359     
00360     if (forceUnlocked)
00361     {
00362         editor->setProtection(false);
00363     }
00364 
00365     editor->setTabWidget(designTabs_);
00366 
00367     connect(editor, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00368         console_, SLOT(onErrorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00369     connect(editor, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00370         console_, SLOT(onNoticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00371     connect(editor, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00372         this, SLOT(updateMenuStrip()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00373     connect(editor, SIGNAL(modifiedChanged(bool)),
00374         actSave_, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00375 }
00376 
00377 void MainWindow::onTabCloseRequested( int index )
00378 {       
00379     Q_ASSERT(designTabs_->widget(index) != 0);
00380     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->widget(index));
00381 
00382     // If the document has been modified, ask a confirmation from the user.
00383     if (doc->isModified())
00384     {
00385         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00386                            "Do you want to save changes to " + doc->getDocumentName() + "?",
00387                            QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No | QMessageBox::Cancel, this);
00388 
00389         int ret = msgBox.exec();
00390 
00391         switch (ret)
00392         {
00393         case QMessageBox::Yes:
00394             {
00395                 // Try to save and if it fails, cancel the close operation.
00396                 if (!doc->save())
00397                 {
00398                     return;
00399                 }
00400                 break;
00401             }
00402 
00403         case QMessageBox::No:
00404             {
00405                 doc->setModified(false);
00406                 break;
00407             }
00408 
00409         case QMessageBox::Cancel:
00410             {
00411                 // Cancel the close operation.
00412                 return;
00413             }
00414         }
00415     }
00416 
00417         // remove the widget from the tabs
00418         designTabs_->removeTab(index);
00419         
00420         // delete the document.
00421         delete doc;
00422 }

00424 void MainWindow::onLibrarySearch() {
00425         
00426         if (libraryHandler_) {
00427                 libraryHandler_->searchForIPXactFiles();
00428         }
00429 }

00588     actProtect_->setProperty("colSpan", 2);
00589     actProtect_->setCheckable(true);
00590     actProtect_->setEnabled(false);
00591     connect(actProtect_, SIGNAL(triggered(bool)), this, SLOT(changeProtection(bool)));
00592 
00593     // Initialize the action to open Kactus2 settings.
00594     actSettings_ = new QAction(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/system-settings.png"), tr("Settings"), this);
00595     actSettings_->setProperty("rowSpan", 2);
00596     actSettings_->setProperty("colSpan", 2);
00597     connect(actSettings_, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(openSettings()));
00598 
00599     // Initialize the action to open the about box.
00600     actAbout_= new QAction(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/system-about.png"), tr("About"), this);
00601     actAbout_->setProperty("rowSpan", 2);
00602     actAbout_->setProperty("colSpan", 2);
00603     connect(actAbout_, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(showAbout()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00604 
00605     // Initialize the action to exit the program.
00606     actExit_ = new QAction(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/system-exit.png"), tr("Exit"), this);
00607     actExit_->setProperty("rowSpan", 2);
00608     actExit_->setProperty("colSpan", 2);
00609     connect(actExit_, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(close()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00610 
00611         setupMenus();
00612 }
00613 
00614 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00615 // Function: restoreSettings()
00616 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00617 void MainWindow::restoreSettings()
00618 {
00619         QSettings settings;
00620 
00621         // if geometry is saved then restore it
00622         if (settings.contains("mainWindow/geometry")) {
00623                 restoreGeometry(settings.value("mainWindow/geometry").toByteArray());
00624         }
00625         // if state of widgets is saved then restore it
00626         if (settings.contains("mainWindow/windowState")) {
00627                 restoreState(settings.value("mainWindow/windowState").toByteArray());
00628         }
00629 }
00630 
00631 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00632 // Function: saveSettings()
00633 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00634 void MainWindow::saveSettings() {
00635         // instance to save the mainWindow settings
00636         QSettings settings;
00637 
00638         // save the geometry and state of windows
00639         settings.setValue("mainWindow/geometry", saveGeometry());
00640         settings.setValue("mainWindow/windowState", saveState());
00641 }

00643 void MainWindow::setupMenus() {
00644     
00645     QDockWidget* menuDock = new QDockWidget(tr("Menu"), this);
00646         menuDock->setObjectName(tr("Menu"));
00647     menuDock->setTitleBarWidget(new QWidget(this));
00648     menuDock->setAllowedAreas(Qt::TopDockWidgetArea);
00649     menuDock->setFeatures(QDockWidget::NoDockWidgetFeatures);
00650 
00651     menuStrip_ = new GCF::MenuStrip(menuDock);
00652     menuStrip_->setFixedHeight(100);
00653 
00654     menuDock->setWidget(menuStrip_);
00655     addDockWidget(Qt::TopDockWidgetArea, menuDock);
00656 
00657     // The "File" group.
00658     GCF::MenuStripGroup* fileGroup = menuStrip_->addGroup(tr("File"));
00659     fileGroup->addAction(actNew_);
00660     fileGroup->addAction(actSave_);
00661         fileGroup->addAction(actSaveAs_);
00662     fileGroup->addAction(actSaveAll_);
00663     fileGroup->addAction(actPrint_);
00664 
00665     // The "Edit" group.
00666     editGroup_ = menuStrip_->addGroup(tr("Edit"));
00667     editGroup_->addAction(actUndo_);
00668     editGroup_->addAction(actRedo_);
00669     editGroup_->setVisible(false);
00670     editGroup_->setEnabled(false);
00671     
00673     GCF::MenuStripGroup* libGroup = menuStrip_->addGroup(tr("Library"));
00674     libGroup->addAction(actLibrarySearch_);
00675     libGroup->addAction(actCheckIntegrity_);
00676     libGroup->addAction(actImportLibFile_);
00677     libGroup->addAction(actExportLibFile_);
00678 
00680     hwDesignGroup_ = menuStrip_->addGroup(tr("HW Design"));
00681     hwDesignGroup_->addAction(actGenVHDL_);
00682     hwDesignGroup_->addAction(actGenDocumentation_);
00683     hwDesignGroup_->addAction(actGenModelSim_);
00684     hwDesignGroup_->addAction(actGenQuartus_);
00685     hwDesignGroup_->setVisible(false);
00686     hwDesignGroup_->setEnabled(false);
00687 
00689     diagramToolsGroup_ = menuStrip_->addGroup(tr("           Diagram Tools           "));
00690     diagramToolsGroup_->addAction(actAddColumn_);
00691     diagramToolsGroup_->addAction(actToolSelect_);
00692     diagramToolsGroup_->addAction(actToolConnect_);
00693     diagramToolsGroup_->addAction(actToolInterface_);
00694     diagramToolsGroup_->addAction(actToolDraft_);
00695     diagramToolsGroup_->setVisible(false);
00696 
00698     GCF::MenuStripGroup* viewGroup = menuStrip_->addGroup(tr("View"));
00699     viewGroup->addAction(actZoomIn_);
00700     viewGroup->addAction(actZoomOut_);
00701     viewGroup->addAction(actZoomOriginal_);
00702     viewGroup->addAction(actFitInView_);
00703         viewGroup->addAction(actVisibleDocks_);
00704 
00706     protectGroup_ = menuStrip_->addGroup(tr("Protection"));
00707     protectGroup_->addAction(actProtect_);
00708     protectGroup_->setVisible(false);
00709 
00711     GCF::MenuStripGroup* sysGroup = menuStrip_->addGroup(tr("System"));
00712     sysGroup->addAction(actSettings_);
00713     sysGroup->addAction(actAbout_);
00714     sysGroup->addAction(actExit_);

00730 void MainWindow::setupLibraryDock() {
00731 
00732         // set up the dock widget for the library
00733         QDockWidget *libraryDock = new QDockWidget(tr("IP-XACT Library"), this);
00734         libraryDock->setObjectName(tr("Library"));
00735         libraryDock->setAllowedAreas(Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea | Qt::RightDockWidgetArea | Qt::BottomDockWidgetArea);
00736     libraryDock->setFeatures(QDockWidget::AllDockWidgetFeatures);
00737 
00738         dialer_ = new VLNVDialer(libraryDock);
00739 
00740         libraryHandler_ = new LibraryHandler(dialer_, this);
00741 
00742         // pass the library root to dialer.
00743         const LibraryItem* root = libraryHandler_->getTreeRoot();
00744         dialer_->setRootItem(root);
00745 
00746         libraryDock->setWidget(libraryHandler_);
00747 
00748         // create a container widget for dialer and library display
00749         QWidget* container = new QWidget(this);
00750         QVBoxLayout* containerLayout = new QVBoxLayout(container);
00751         containerLayout->addWidget(dialer_, 0);
00752         containerLayout->addWidget(libraryHandler_, 1);
00753         containerLayout->setSpacing(0);
00754         libraryDock->setWidget(container);
00755 
00756         addDockWidget(Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea, libraryDock);
00757 
00758         // set up the preview box to display the component preview
00759         QDockWidget* previewDock = new QDockWidget(tr("Component Preview"), this);
00760         previewDock->setObjectName(tr("ComponentPreview"));
00761         previewDock->setAllowedAreas(Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea | Qt::RightDockWidgetArea 
00762                 | Qt::BottomDockWidgetArea);
00763         previewDock->setFeatures(QDockWidget::AllDockWidgetFeatures);
00764 
00765         previewBox_ = new ComponentPreviewBox(libraryHandler_);
00766         previewDock->setWidget(previewBox_);
00767 
00768         addDockWidget(Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea, previewDock);
00769 
00770         connect(libraryHandler_, SIGNAL(openDesign(const VLNV&, const QString&)),
00771                 this, SLOT(openDesign(const VLNV&, const QString&)));
00772         connect(libraryHandler_, SIGNAL(createBus(const VLNV&, const QString&)),
00773                 this, SLOT(createBus(const VLNV&, const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00774         connect(libraryHandler_, SIGNAL(createAbsDef(const VLNV&, const QString&, bool)),
00775                 this, SLOT(createAbsDef(const VLNV&, const QString&, bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00776         connect(libraryHandler_, SIGNAL(openComponent(const VLNV&)),
00777                 this, SLOT(openComponent(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00778     connect(libraryHandler_, SIGNAL(openSWDesign(const VLNV&)),
00779         this, SLOT(openSWDesign(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00780         connect(libraryHandler_, SIGNAL(openBus(const VLNV&, const VLNV&, bool)),
00781                 this, SLOT(openBus(const VLNV&, const VLNV&, bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00782         connect(libraryHandler_, SIGNAL(refreshDialer()),
00783                 dialer_, SLOT(refreshLibrary()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00784         connect(libraryHandler_, SIGNAL(itemSelected(const VLNV&)),
00785                 previewBox_, SLOT(setComponent(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00786         connect(libraryHandler_, SIGNAL(openSystem(const VLNV&)),
00787                 this, SLOT(openSystem(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00788 
00789         connect(libraryHandler_, SIGNAL(createComponent(KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy,
00790                                                             KactusAttribute::Firmness,
00791                                                             const VLNV&, const QString&)),
00792                                                             this, SLOT(createComponent(KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy,
00793                                                             KactusAttribute::Firmness,
00794                                                             const VLNV&, const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00795 }

00867 
00868 void MainWindow::onDesignChanged() {
00869 
00870         // find the currently open editor
00871         QWidget* widget = designTabs_->currentWidget();
00872 
00873         // if editor was found
00874         if (widget) {
00875                 DesignWidget* editor = qobject_cast<DesignWidget*>(widget);
00876                 
00877                 // if editor is design widget then set it to be modified.
00878                 if (editor) {
00879                         editor->setModified(true);
00880                         updateMenuStrip();
00881                 }
00882         }
00883 }
00884 
00885 void MainWindow::onClearItemSelection() {
00886 
00887         instanceEditor_->clear();
00888         interfaceEditor_->clear();
00889         connectionEditor_->clear();
00890 }
00891 
00892 void MainWindow::onComponentSelected( ComponentItem* component ) {
00893 
00894         Q_ASSERT(component);
00895 
00896         connectionEditor_->clear();
00897         interfaceEditor_->clear();
00898 
00899         // update the instance editor
00900         instanceEditor_->setComponent(component);
00901         displayDockedEditor(instanceEditor_);
00902 
00903     if (component->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
00904     {
00905             libraryHandler_->onSelectionChanged(*component->componentModel()->getVlnv());
00906                 previewBox_->setComponent(*component->componentModel()->getVlnv());
00907     }
00908     else
00909     {
00910         libraryHandler_->onClearSelection();
00911     }
00912 }
00913 
00914 void MainWindow::onPortSelected( DiagramPort* port ) {
00915 
00916         Q_ASSERT(port);
00917 
00918         // if the port has an encompassing component then it is selected
00919         DiagramComponent* component = port->encompassingComp();
00920 //      if (component)
00921 //              onComponentSelected(component);
00922 
00923         if (component->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid()) {
00924 
00925                 libraryHandler_->onSelectionChanged(*component->componentModel()->getVlnv());
00926                 previewBox_->setComponent(*component->componentModel()->getVlnv());
00927         }
00928         // if no component can be identified
00929         else
00930                 libraryHandler_->onClearSelection();
00931 
00932         connectionEditor_->clear();
00933         instanceEditor_->clear();
00934         interfaceEditor_->setInterface(port);
00935         displayDockedEditor(interfaceEditor_);
00936 }
00937 
00938 void MainWindow::onInterfaceSelected( DiagramInterface* interface ) {
00939 
00940         Q_ASSERT(interface);
00941 
00942         connectionEditor_->clear();
00943         instanceEditor_->clear();
00944         interfaceEditor_->setInterface(interface);
00945         displayDockedEditor(interfaceEditor_);
00946 }
00947 
00948 void MainWindow::onConnectionSelected( DiagramInterconnection* connection ) {
00949         Q_ASSERT(connection);
00950 
00951         instanceEditor_->clear();
00952         interfaceEditor_->clear();
00953         connectionEditor_->setConnection(connection);
00954         displayDockedEditor(connectionEditor_);
00955 }
00956 
00957 void MainWindow::onImportLibFile() {
00958         QString file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, 
00959                 tr("Import Library File"),
00960                 QDir::homePath(),
00961                 tr("Ini Files (*.ini)"));
00962 
00963         // if clicked cancel
00964         if (file.isEmpty())
00965                 return;
00966 
00967         libraryHandler_->importLibraryFile(file);
00968 }
00969 
00970 void MainWindow::onExportLibFile() {
00971         QString file = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, tr("Export Library File"),
00972                                                         QDir::homePath(), tr("Ini Files (*.ini)"));
00973 
00974         // if user clicked cancel
00975         if (file.isEmpty())
00976                 return;
00977 
00978         libraryHandler_->exportLibraryFile(file);
00979 }
00980 
00981 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00982 // Function: updateMenuStrip()
00983 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00984 void MainWindow::updateMenuStrip()
00985 {
00986     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
00987     bool unlocked = doc != 0 && (!(doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_PROTECTION_SUPPORT) ||
00988                                   !doc->isProtected());
00989 
00990         bool isHWComp = false;
00991         IPXactComponentEditor* ipEditor = dynamic_cast<IPXactComponentEditor*>(doc);
00992         if (ipEditor) {
00993                 isHWComp = ipEditor->isHWImplementation();
00994         }
00995 
00996         bool isHWDesign = false;
00997         DesignWidget* designWidget = dynamic_cast<DesignWidget*>(doc);
00998         if (designWidget) {
00999                 isHWDesign = designWidget->isHWImplementation();
01000         }
01001 
01002     actSave_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && doc->isModified());
01003     actSaveAs_->setEnabled(doc != 0);
01004     actPrint_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && (doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_PRINT_SUPPORT));
01005 
01006         // if is hardware design then set all actions enabled
01007         if (isHWDesign) {
01008                 hwDesignGroup_->setVisible(true);
01009         hwDesignGroup_->setEnabled(unlocked);
01010                 actGenVHDL_->setEnabled(unlocked);
01011                 actGenDocumentation_->setEnabled(unlocked);
01012                 actGenModelSim_->setEnabled(unlocked);
01013                 actGenQuartus_->setEnabled(unlocked);
01014         }
01015         // if is hardware component then set only documentation and vhdl enabled
01016         else if (isHWComp) {
01017         hwDesignGroup_->setVisible(true);
01018                 hwDesignGroup_->setEnabled(unlocked);
01019                 actGenVHDL_->setEnabled(unlocked);
01020                 actGenDocumentation_->setEnabled(unlocked);
01021                 actGenModelSim_->setDisabled(true);
01022                 actGenQuartus_->setDisabled(true);
01023         }
01024         else {
01025                 hwDesignGroup_->setVisible(false);
01026         }
01027 
01028     editGroup_->setVisible(doc != 0 && (doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_EDIT_SUPPORT));
01029     editGroup_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && (doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_EDIT_SUPPORT) && unlocked);
01030     actUndo_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && doc->getEditProvider() != 0 && doc->getEditProvider()->canUndo());
01031     actRedo_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && doc->getEditProvider() != 0 && doc->getEditProvider()->canRedo());
01032 
01033     diagramToolsGroup_->setVisible(doc != 0 && (doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_DRAW_MODE_SUPPORT));
01034     diagramToolsGroup_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && (doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_DRAW_MODE_SUPPORT) &&
01035                                 !doc->isProtected());
01036     actToolSelect_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && (doc->getSupportedDrawModes() & MODE_SELECT));
01037     actToolConnect_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && (doc->getSupportedDrawModes() & MODE_CONNECT));
01038     actToolInterface_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && (doc->getSupportedDrawModes() & MODE_INTERFACE));
01039     actToolDraft_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && (doc->getSupportedDrawModes() & MODE_DRAFT));
01040 
01041         bool oldProtectionState = actProtect_->isChecked();
01042 
01043     protectGroup_->setVisible(doc != 0 && (doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_PROTECTION_SUPPORT));
01044         actProtect_->setEnabled(doc != 0 && (doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_PROTECTION_SUPPORT));
01045     actProtect_->setChecked(doc != 0 && (doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_PROTECTION_SUPPORT) &&
01046                             doc->isProtected());
01047 
01048     if (oldProtectionState != actProtect_->isChecked())
01049                 onProtectionChanged(actProtect_->isChecked());
01050 
01051     updateZoomTools();
01052 }
01053 
01054 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01055 // Function: saveCurrentAs()
01056 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01057 void MainWindow::saveCurrentAs() {
01058         TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01059 
01060         if (doc != 0)
01061     {
01062         doc->saveAs();
01063                 onTabChanged(designTabs_->currentIndex());
01064         }
01065 }
01066 
01067 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01068 // Function: saveCurrent()
01069 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01070 void MainWindow::saveCurrent()
01071 {
01072     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01073 
01074     if (doc != 0)
01075     {
01076         doc->save();
01077                 onTabChanged(designTabs_->currentIndex());
01078     }
01079 }
01080 
01081 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01082 // Function: saveAll()
01083 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01084 void MainWindow::saveAll()
01085 {
01086     // Go through all documents and save those that have been modified.
01087     for (int i = 0; i < designTabs_->count(); ++i)
01088     {
01089         TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->widget(i));
01090 
01091         if (doc->isModified())
01092         {
01093             doc->save();
01094         }
01095     }
01096 
01097     if (designTabs_->currentWidget() != 0)
01098     {
01099         TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01100         actSave_->setEnabled(doc->isModified());
01101     }
01102     else
01103     {
01104         actSave_->setEnabled(false);
01105     }
01106 }
01107 
01108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01109 // Function: printCurrent()
01110 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01111 void MainWindow::printCurrent()
01112 {
01113     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01114     Q_ASSERT(doc != 0);
01115 
01116     doc->print();    
01117 }

01119 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01120 // Function: addColumn()
01121 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01122 void MainWindow::addColumn()
01123 {
01124     QWidget* curWidget = designTabs_->currentWidget();
01125     DesignWidget* designWidget = dynamic_cast<DesignWidget*>(curWidget);
01126     EndpointDesignWidget* endpointWidget = dynamic_cast<EndpointDesignWidget*>(curWidget);
01127 
01128     if (designWidget != 0)
01129     {
01130         designWidget->addColumn();
01131     }
01132     else if (endpointWidget != 0)
01133     {
01134         endpointWidget->addColumn();
01135     }
01136 }
01137 
01138 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01139 // Function: generateVHDL()
01140 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01141 void MainWindow::generateVHDL()
01142 {
01143     DesignWidget* designWidget = dynamic_cast<DesignWidget*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01144         IPXactComponentEditor* compEditor = dynamic_cast<IPXactComponentEditor*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01145 
01146     if (designWidget != 0)
01147     {
01148         designWidget->onVhdlGenerate();
01149     }
01150         else if (compEditor) {
01151                 
01152                 // if user changed the metadata then the editor must be reopened
01153                 if (compEditor->onVhdlGenerate()) {
01154 
01155                         int index = designTabs_->currentIndex();
01156                         VLNV compVLNV = compEditor->getComponentVLNV();
01157 
01158                         designTabs_->removeTab(index);
01159                         delete compEditor;
01160 
01161                         openComponent(compVLNV, true);
01162                 }
01163         }
01164 }
01165

01172     
01173         if (designWidget != 0)
01174     {
01175         designWidget->onModelsimGenerate();
01176     }
01177         
01178 }

01192 
01193 void MainWindow::generateDoc() {
01194         // get the vlnv of the current component
01195         TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01196         Q_ASSERT(doc);
01197         Q_ASSERT(doc->isHWImplementation());
01198         VLNV vlnv = doc->getComponentVLNV();
01199         Q_ASSERT(vlnv.isValid());
01200 
01201         // if changes have been made to the component
01202         if (doc->isModified()) {
01203                 QMessageBox::information(this, QCoreApplication::applicationName(), 
01204                         tr("Changes have been made to the component. Save the changes before "
01205                         "generating documentation."));
01206                 return;
01207         }
01208 
01209         DocumentGenerator generator(libraryHandler_, this);
01210         connect(&generator, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
01211                 console_, SLOT(onErrorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01212         connect(&generator, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
01213                 console_, SLOT(onNoticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01214         
01215         // set the component that's documentation is generated.
01216         generator.setComponent(vlnv);
01217         
01218         // write the documentation
01219         QString htmlFilePath = generator.writeDocumentation();
01220         
01221         // if user canceled
01222         if (htmlFilePath.isEmpty()) {
01223                 return;
01224         }
01225 
01226         // open the generated document in user's default browser
01227         QDesktopServices::openUrl(QUrl::fromLocalFile(htmlFilePath));
01228 
01229         // if the editor was component editor then it must be refreshed to make the
01230         // changes to metadata visible
01231         IPXactComponentEditor* compEditor = dynamic_cast<IPXactComponentEditor*>(doc);
01232         if (compEditor) {
01233 
01234                 // close the editor
01235                 bool wasLocked = compEditor->isProtected();
01236                 int index = designTabs_->currentIndex();
01237                 designTabs_->removeTab(index);
01238                 delete compEditor;
01239 
01240                 // open the component again in the editor
01241                 openComponent(vlnv, !wasLocked);
01242         }
01243 }
01244 
01245 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01246 // Function: zoomIn()
01247 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01248 void MainWindow::zoomIn()
01249 {
01250     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01251     Q_ASSERT(doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_ZOOM_SUPPORT);
01252     doc->setZoomLevel(doc->getZoomLevel() + 10);
01253     updateZoomTools();
01254 }
01255 
01256 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

01258 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01259 void MainWindow::zoomOut()
01260 {
01261     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01262     Q_ASSERT(doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_ZOOM_SUPPORT);
01263     doc->setZoomLevel(doc->getZoomLevel() - 10);
01264     updateZoomTools();
01265 }

01273     Q_ASSERT(doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_ZOOM_SUPPORT);

01289 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01290 // Function: drawModeChange()
01291 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01292 void MainWindow::drawModeChange(QAction *action)
01293 {
01294     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01295 
01296     if (action == actToolSelect_)
01297     {
01298         doc->setMode(MODE_SELECT);
01299     }
01300     else if (action == actToolConnect_)
01301     {
01302         doc->setMode(MODE_CONNECT);
01303     }
01304     else if (action == actToolInterface_)
01305     {
01306         doc->setMode(MODE_INTERFACE);
01307     }
01308     else if (action == actToolDraft_)
01309     {
01310         doc->setMode(MODE_DRAFT);
01311     }
01312 }
01313 
01314 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01315 // Function: onDrawModeChanged()
01316 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01317 void MainWindow::onDrawModeChanged(DrawMode mode)
01318 {
01319     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01320 
01321     if (doc != 0 && doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_DRAW_MODE_SUPPORT)
01322     {
01323         switch (mode)
01324         {
01325         case MODE_CONNECT:
01326         case MODE_INTERFACE:
01327         case MODE_DRAFT:
01328             {
01329                 doc->setCursor(Qt::CrossCursor);
01330                 break;
01331             }
01332         
01333         default:
01334             {
01335                 // If mode is set to select.
01336                 doc->setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
01337                 break;
01338             }
01339         }
01340     }
01341 
01342     actToolSelect_->setChecked(mode == MODE_SELECT);
01343     actToolConnect_->setChecked(mode == MODE_CONNECT);
01344     actToolInterface_->setChecked(mode == MODE_INTERFACE);
01345     actToolDraft_->setChecked(mode == MODE_DRAFT);
01346 }
01347 
01348 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01349 // Function: onTabChanged()
01350 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01351 void MainWindow::onTabChanged(int index)
01352 {
01353     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->widget(index));
01354 
01355         // if the new tab is designWidget
01356         DesignWidget* designwidget = dynamic_cast<DesignWidget*>(doc);
01357         // set the configuration manager to edit the active design
01358         if (designwidget && designwidget->getHierComponent()->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_HW) {
01359                 configurationEditor_->setConfiguration(designwidget, designwidget->isProtected());
01360         }
01361         
01362         else if (designwidget) {
01363                 configurationEditor_->setConfiguration(designwidget, true);
01364         }
01365         // active tab is not design widget so clear the editors associated with design widget
01366         else {
01367                 configurationEditor_->clear();
01368                 instanceEditor_->clear();
01369                 interfaceEditor_->clear();
01370                 connectionEditor_->clear();
01371         }
01372 
01373     // Reset the draw mode to select.
01374     if (doc != 0 && (doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_DRAW_MODE_SUPPORT))
01375     {
01376         doc->setMode(MODE_SELECT);
01377     }
01378     else
01379     {
01380         onDrawModeChanged(MODE_SELECT);
01381     }
01382     
01383     // Update the menu strip.
01384     updateMenuStrip();
01385 }
01386 
01387 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01388 // Function: closeEvent()
01389 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01390 void MainWindow::closeEvent(QCloseEvent* event)
01391 {
01392     // Go through all tab documents and ask the user what to do if they are not saved.
01393     while (designTabs_->count() > 0)
01394     {
01395         TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01396 
01397         if (doc->isModified())
01398         {
01399             QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
01400                                "Do you want to save changes to " + doc->getDocumentName() + "?",
01401                                QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No | QMessageBox::Cancel, this);
01402 
01403             int ret = msgBox.exec();
01404 
01405             switch (ret)
01406             {
01407             case QMessageBox::Yes:
01408                 {
01409                     // Try to save and if it fails, cancel the close event.
01410                     if (!doc->save())
01411                     {
01412                         event->ignore();
01413                         return;
01414                     }
01415                     break;
01416                 }
01417                 
01418             case QMessageBox::No:
01419                 {
01420                     doc->setModified(false);
01421                     break;
01422                 }
01423 
01424             case QMessageBox::Cancel:
01425                 {
01426                     event->ignore();
01427                     return;
01428                 }
01429             }
01430         }
01431 
01432         designTabs_->removeTab(designTabs_->currentIndex());
01433         delete doc;
01434         doc = 0;
01435     }
01436 }
01437 
01438 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01439 // Function: openSource()
01440 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01441 void MainWindow::openSource(ProgramEntityItem* progEntity)
01442 {
01443     Q_ASSERT(progEntity != 0);
01444 
01445     ApplicationItem* appItem = progEntity->getApplication();
01446     Q_ASSERT(appItem != 0);
01447 
01448     if (appItem->componentModel()->getFileSet("cSources") == 0 ||
01449         appItem->componentModel()->getFileSet("cSources")->getFiles().count() == 0)
01450     {
01451         return;
01452     }
01453     
01454     QString filename = appItem->componentModel()->getFileSet("cSources")->getFiles().first()->getName();
01455 
01456     // TODO: Test!
01457     filename = General::getAbsolutePath(libraryHandler_->getPath(*appItem->componentModel()->getVlnv()),
01458                                         filename);
01459 
01460     // Check if the source is already open and activate it.
01461     for (int i = 0; i < designTabs_->count(); i++)
01462     {
01463         MCAPISourceWidget* sourceWidget = dynamic_cast<MCAPISourceWidget*>(designTabs_->widget(i));
01464 
01465         if (sourceWidget != 0 && sourceWidget->getSourceFile() == filename)
01466         {
01467             designTabs_->setCurrentIndex(i);
01468             return;
01469         }
01470     }
01471 
01472     // Otherwise make sure that the file exists.
01473     if (!QFile::exists(filename))
01474     {
01475         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
01476                            "The source file " + filename + " is not found!",
01477                            QMessageBox::Ok, this);
01478         msgBox.exec();
01479         return;
01480     }
01481     
01482     // And open the source to a view.
01483     MCAPISourceWidget* sourceWidget = new MCAPISourceWidget(filename,
01484                                                             progEntity->getContentMatcher(), this, this);
01485 
01486     connect(sourceWidget, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(updateMenuStrip()));
01487     connect(sourceWidget->getEditProvider(), SIGNAL(editStateChanged()), this, SLOT(updateMenuStrip()));
01488     sourceWidget->setTabWidget(designTabs_);
01489 }
01490 
01491 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01492 // Function: updateZoomTools()
01493 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01494 void MainWindow::updateZoomTools()
01495 {
01496     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
01497     bool canZoom = doc != 0 && (doc->getFlags() & TabDocument::DOC_ZOOM_SUPPORT);
01498 
01499     actZoomIn_->setEnabled(canZoom && doc->getZoomLevel() < doc->getMaxZoomLevel());
01500     actZoomOut_->setEnabled(canZoom && doc->getZoomLevel() > doc->getMinZoomLevel());
01501     actZoomOriginal_->setEnabled(canZoom);
01502     actFitInView_->setEnabled(canZoom);
01503 }
01504 
01505 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01506 // Function: createNew()
01507 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01508 void MainWindow::createNew()
01509 {
01510     // Create a property page dialog to work as a "New" dialog.
01511     PropertyPageDialog dialog(QSize(48, 48), 110, QSize(80, 70), PropertyPageDialog::APPLY_CURRENT, this);
01512     dialog.setFixedWidth(620);
01513     dialog.resize(620, 580);
01514     dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("New"));
01515 
01516     // Add pages to the dialog.
01517     NewComponentPage* compPage = new NewComponentPage(libraryHandler_, &dialog);
01518     connect(compPage, SIGNAL(createComponent(KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy,
01519                                              KactusAttribute::Firmness,
01520                                              VLNV const&, QString const&)),
01521             this, SLOT(createComponent(KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy,
01522                                        KactusAttribute::Firmness,
01523                                        VLNV const&, QString const&)));
01524     dialog.addPage(QIcon(":icons/graphics/new-component.png"), tr("Component"), compPage);
01525 
01526     NewDesignPage* designPage = new NewDesignPage(libraryHandler_, &dialog);
01527     connect(designPage, SIGNAL(createDesign(KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy,
01528                                             KactusAttribute::Firmness,
01529                                             VLNV const&, QString const&)),
01530             this, SLOT(createDesign(KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy,
01531                                     KactusAttribute::Firmness,
01532                                     VLNV const&, QString const&)));
01533     dialog.addPage(QIcon(":icons/graphics/new-design.png"), tr("Design"), designPage);
01534 
01535     NewSWComponentPage* swCompPage = new NewSWComponentPage(libraryHandler_, &dialog);
01536     connect(swCompPage, SIGNAL(createSWComponent(SWCreateType, VLNV const&, QString const&)),
01537             this, SLOT(createSWComponent(SWCreateType, VLNV const&, QString const&)));
01538     dialog.addPage(QIcon(":icons/graphics/new-sw_component.png"), tr("SW Component"), swCompPage);
01539 
01540     NewSWDesignPage* swDesignPage = new NewSWDesignPage(libraryHandler_, &dialog);
01541     connect(swDesignPage, SIGNAL(createSWDesign(VLNV const&, QString const&)),
01542             this, SLOT(createSWDesign(VLNV const&, QString const&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01543     dialog.addPage(QIcon(":icons/graphics/new-sw_design.png"), tr("SW Design"), swDesignPage);
01544 
01545     NewSystemPage* sysPage = new NewSystemPage(libraryHandler_, &dialog);
01546     connect(sysPage, SIGNAL(createSystem(VLNV const&, VLNV const&, QString const&)),
01547         this, SLOT(createSystem(VLNV const&, VLNV const&, QString const&)));
01548     dialog.addPage(QIcon(":icons/graphics/new-system.png"), tr("System"), sysPage);
01549 
01550         NewBusPage* busPage = new NewBusPage(libraryHandler_, &dialog);
01551         connect(busPage, SIGNAL(createBus(VLNV const&, QString const&)),
01552                 this, SLOT(createBus(VLNV const&, QString const&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01553         dialog.addPage(QIcon(":icons/graphics/new-bus.png"), tr("Bus"), busPage);
01554 
01555     dialog.exec();
01556 }

01558 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01559 // Function: createComponent()
01560 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01561 void MainWindow::createComponent(KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy prodHier,
01562                                  KactusAttribute::Firmness firmness,
01563                                  VLNV const& vlnv, QString const& directory)
01564 {
01565     Q_ASSERT(vlnv.isValid());
01566 
01567     // Create a component.
01568     QSharedPointer<Component> component = QSharedPointer<Component>(new Component());
01569     component->setVlnv(vlnv);
01570 
01571     // Set Kactus attributes.
01572     component->setComponentHierarchy(prodHier);
01573     component->setComponentFirmness(firmness);
01574     component->setComponentImplementation(KactusAttribute::KTS_HW);
01575         component->createEmptyFlatView();
01576 
01577     // Create the file.
01578     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, component);
01579     
01580     // Open the component editor.
01581     openComponent(vlnv, true);
01582 }
01583 
01584 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01585 // Function: createDesign()
01586 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01587 void MainWindow::createDesign(KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy prodHier,
01588                               KactusAttribute::Firmness firmness,
01589                               VLNV const& vlnv, QString const& directory)
01590 {
01591     Q_ASSERT(vlnv.isValid());
01592 
01593     VLNV designVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
01594                     vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".design", vlnv.getVersion());
01595     VLNV desConfVLNV(VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
01596                      vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".designcfg", vlnv.getVersion());
01597 
01598     // Create a component and a hierarchical view .
01599     QSharedPointer<Component> component(new Component(vlnv));
01600 
01601     // Set Kactus attributes.
01602     component->setComponentHierarchy(prodHier);
01603     component->setComponentFirmness(firmness);
01604     component->setComponentImplementation(KactusAttribute::KTS_HW);
01605 
01606         component->createHierarchicalView(desConfVLNV);
01607         QStringList viewNames = component->getHierViews();
01608         Q_ASSERT(!viewNames.isEmpty());
01609 
01610     // Create the design and design configuration.
01611     QSharedPointer<Design> design(new Design(designVLNV));
01612     QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> designConf(new DesignConfiguration(desConfVLNV));
01613     designConf->setDesignRef(designVLNV);
01614 
01615     // Create the files.
01616     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, designConf);
01617     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, design);
01618     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, component);
01619 
01620     // Open the design.
01621     openDesign(vlnv, viewNames.first(), true);
01622 }
01623 
01624 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01625 // Function: createSWDesign()
01626 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01627 void MainWindow::createSWDesign(VLNV const& vlnv, QString const& directory)
01628 {
01629     Q_ASSERT(vlnv.isValid());
01630 
01631     VLNV designVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
01632                     vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".design", vlnv.getVersion());
01633     
01634     // Create a component and a hierarchical view.
01635     QSharedPointer<Component> component(new Component(vlnv));
01636     component->setComponentImplementation(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW);
01637     component->setComponentSWType(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_MAPPING);
01638 
01639     View* hierView = new View(tr("kts_sw_ref"));
01640     hierView->setHierarchyRef(designVLNV);
01641     hierView->addEnvIdentifier("");
01642 
01643     Model* model = new Model;
01644     model->addView(hierView);
01645     component->setModel(model);
01646 
01647     // Create the design.
01648     QSharedPointer<Design> design(new Design(designVLNV));
01649 
01650     // Create the files.
01651     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, design);
01652     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, component);
01653 
01654     // Open the design.
01655     openSWDesign(vlnv, true);
01656 }
01657 
01658 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01659 // Function: openSettings()
01660 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01661 void MainWindow::openSettings()
01662 {
01663     SettingsDialog dialog(this);
01664     
01665     if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
01666     {
01667         QSettings settings;
01668 
01669         // Apply the settings to the open documents.
01670         for (int i = 0; i < designTabs_->count(); ++i)
01671         {
01672             TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->widget(i));
01673             Q_ASSERT(doc != 0);
01674 
01675             doc->applySettings(settings);
01676         }
01677     }
01678 }
01679 
01680 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01681 // Function: createSystem()
01682 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01683 void MainWindow::createSystem(VLNV const& compVLNV, VLNV const& sysVLNV, QString const& directory)
01684 {
01685     Q_ASSERT(compVLNV.isValid());
01686     Q_ASSERT(sysVLNV.isValid());
01687 
01688     VLNV designVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, sysVLNV.getVendor(), sysVLNV.getLibrary(),
01689         sysVLNV.getName().remove(".comp") + ".design", sysVLNV.getVersion());
01690     VLNV desConfVLNV(VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION, sysVLNV.getVendor(), sysVLNV.getLibrary(),
01691         sysVLNV.getName().remove(".comp") + ".designcfg", sysVLNV.getVersion());
01692 
01693     // Retrieve the component to which the system design will be based on.
01694     QSharedPointer<Component> component = libraryHandler_->getModel(compVLNV).staticCast<Component>();
01695     Q_ASSERT(component != 0);
01696 
01697     // Create a system component to encapsulate the system design.
01698     QSharedPointer<Component> sysComp(new Component(sysVLNV));
01699     sysComp->setComponentHierarchy(KactusAttribute::KTS_PRODUCT);
01700     sysComp->setComponentFirmness(KactusAttribute::KTS_FIXED);
01701     sysComp->setComponentImplementation(KactusAttribute::KTS_SYS);
01702 
01703     // Create the view to the system design.
01704     View* hierView = new View("kts_sys_ref");
01705     hierView->setHierarchyRef(desConfVLNV);
01706     hierView->addEnvIdentifier("");
01707 
01708     // Create the view to the HW design.
01709     View* hwView = new View("kts_hw_ref");
01710     hwView->setHierarchyRef(component->getHierRef("structural")); // TODO: View name should be asked from the user.
01711     hwView->addEnvIdentifier("");
01712 
01713     Model* model = new Model;
01714     model->addView(hierView);
01715     model->addView(hwView);
01716 
01717     sysComp->setModel(model);
01718 
01719     // Flat-out the hierarchy to form the system design.
01720     QSharedPointer<Design> sysDesign(new Design(designVLNV));
01721     generateSystemDesign(libraryHandler_, directory, component->getHierRef("structural"), *sysDesign);
01722 
01723     // Create the design configuration.
01724     QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> designConf(new DesignConfiguration(desConfVLNV));
01725     designConf->setDesignRef(designVLNV);
01726 
01727     // Create the files.
01728     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, designConf);
01729     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, sysDesign);
01730     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, sysComp);
01731     
01732     openSystem(sysVLNV, true);
01733 }
01734 
01735 void MainWindow::createBus( VLNV const& vlnv, QString const& directory ) {
01736 
01737         Q_ASSERT(vlnv.isValid());
01738         Q_ASSERT(!directory.isEmpty());
01739 
01740         // create the vlnvs that identify the bus definition and abstraction definition
01741         VLNV busVLNV = vlnv;
01742         busVLNV.setType(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION);
01743 
01744         Q_ASSERT(!libraryHandler_->contains(busVLNV));
01745 
01746         VLNV absVLNV = busVLNV;
01747 
01748         // remove the possible .busDef from the end of the name field
01749         QString absDefName = busVLNV.getName();
01750         absDefName = absDefName.remove(".busDef", Qt::CaseInsensitive);
01751 
01752         absVLNV.setName(absDefName + ".absDef");
01753         absVLNV.setType(VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION);
01754 
01755         // by default the abs def and bus def are saved to same directory
01756         QString absDirectory = directory;
01757 
01758         if (libraryHandler_->contains(absVLNV)) {
01759                 VLNV newAbsDefVLNV;
01760 
01761                 if (!NewObjectDialog::saveAsDialog(this, libraryHandler_, absVLNV, newAbsDefVLNV, absDirectory,
01762                         "Set VLNV for abstraction definition")) {
01763                         // if user canceled
01764                         return;
01765                 }
01766                 // save the created abstraction definition vlnv
01767                 absVLNV = newAbsDefVLNV;
01768         }
01769 
01770         // Create a bus definition.
01771         QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = QSharedPointer<BusDefinition>(new BusDefinition());
01772         busDef->setVlnv(busVLNV);
01773 
01774         // Create the file for the bus definition.
01775     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, busDef);
01776 
01777         // create an abstraction definition
01778         QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef = QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition>(new AbstractionDefinition());
01779         absDef->setVlnv(absVLNV);
01780 
01781         // set reference from abstraction definition to bus definition
01782         absDef->setBusType(busVLNV);
01783 
01784         // create the file for the abstraction definition
01785     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(absDirectory, absDef);
01786         
01787         // Open the bus editor.
01788         openBus(busVLNV, absVLNV, false, true);
01789 }
01790 
01791 void MainWindow::createAbsDef( const VLNV& busDefVLNV, const QString& directory, bool disableBusDef ) {
01792 
01793         Q_ASSERT(busDefVLNV.isValid());
01794         Q_ASSERT(!directory.isEmpty());
01795 
01796         VLNV absVLNV = busDefVLNV;
01797 
01798         // remove the possible .busDef from the end of the name field
01799         QString absDefName = busDefVLNV.getName();
01800         absDefName = absDefName.remove(".busDef", Qt::CaseInsensitive);
01801 
01802         absVLNV.setName(absDefName + ".absDef");
01803         absVLNV.setType(VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION);
01804 
01805         // by default the abs def and bus def are saved to same directory
01806         QString absDirectory = directory;
01807 
01808         if (libraryHandler_->contains(absVLNV)) {
01809                 VLNV newAbsDefVLNV;
01810 
01811                 if (!NewObjectDialog::saveAsDialog(this, libraryHandler_, absVLNV, newAbsDefVLNV, absDirectory,
01812                         "Set VLNV for abstraction definition")) {
01813                                 // if user canceled
01814                                 return;
01815                 }
01816                 // save the created abstraction definition vlnv
01817                 absVLNV = newAbsDefVLNV;
01818         }
01819 
01820         // create an abstraction definition
01821         QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef = QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition>(new AbstractionDefinition());
01822         absDef->setVlnv(absVLNV);
01823 
01824         // set reference from abstraction definition to bus definition
01825         absDef->setBusType(busDefVLNV);
01826 
01827         // create the file for the abstraction definition
01828         libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(absDirectory, absDef);
01829 
01830         // Open the bus editor.
01831         openBus(busDefVLNV, absVLNV, disableBusDef, true);
01832 }
01833 
01834 void MainWindow::openBus(const VLNV& busDefVLNV, const VLNV& absDefVLNV, bool disableBusDef, bool forceUnlocked ) {
01835 
01836         // Check if the bus editor is already open and activate it.
01837         if (busDefVLNV.isValid()) {
01838                 for (int i = 0; i < designTabs_->count(); i++) {
01839                         BusEditor* editor = dynamic_cast<BusEditor*>(designTabs_->widget(i));
01840 
01841                         // if the abstraction definition matches
01842                         if (editor && absDefVLNV.isValid() && editor->getComponentVLNV() == absDefVLNV) {
01843                                 designTabs_->setCurrentIndex(i);
01844                                 return;
01845                         }
01846 
01847                         // if bus definition matches
01848                         if (editor && editor->getComponentVLNV() == busDefVLNV) {
01849                                 designTabs_->setCurrentIndex(i);
01850                                 return;
01851                         }
01852                 }
01853         }
01854         // at least the bus definition vlnv must be valid
01855         else {
01856                 return;
01857         }
01858 
01859         // Editor for given vlnv was not yet open so create one for it
01860         QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef;
01861         QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef;
01862 
01863         if (libraryHandler_->contains(busDefVLNV) && 
01864                 libraryHandler_->getDocumentType(busDefVLNV) == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION) {
01865 
01866                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = libraryHandler_->getModel(busDefVLNV);
01867                 busDef = libComp.dynamicCast<BusDefinition>();
01868         }
01869         else {
01870                 emit errorMessage(tr("Bus definition %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in the library").arg(
01871                         busDefVLNV.getVendor()).arg(
01872                         busDefVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(
01873                         busDefVLNV.getName()).arg(
01874                         busDefVLNV.getVersion()));
01875                 return;
01876         }
01877 
01878         // pointer to the bus editor
01879         BusEditor* editor = 0;
01880 
01881         // if abstraction definition has been specified
01882         if (absDefVLNV.isValid()) {
01883 
01884                 // if library contains the abstraction definition
01885                 if (libraryHandler_->contains(absDefVLNV) && 
01886                         libraryHandler_->getDocumentType(absDefVLNV) == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION) {
01887                         
01888                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = libraryHandler_->getModel(absDefVLNV);
01889                         absDef = libComp.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
01890 
01891                         editor = new BusEditor(this, libraryHandler_, busDef, absDef, disableBusDef);
01892                 }
01893                 else {
01894                         emit errorMessage(tr("Abstraction definition %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in the library").arg(
01895                                 absDefVLNV.getVendor()).arg(
01896                                 absDefVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(
01897                                 absDefVLNV.getName()).arg(
01898                                 absDefVLNV.getVersion()));
01899                         return;
01900                 }
01901         }
01902 
01903         // if no abstraction definition has been specified.
01904         else {
01905                 editor = new BusEditor(this, libraryHandler_, busDef);
01906         }
01907 
01908     if (forceUnlocked)
01909     {
01910         editor->setProtection(false);
01911     }
01912 
01913         editor->setTabWidget(designTabs_);
01914 
01915         connect(editor, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
01916                 console_, SLOT(onErrorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01917         connect(editor, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
01918                 console_, SLOT(onNoticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01919         connect(editor, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
01920                 this, SLOT(updateMenuStrip()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01921         connect(editor, SIGNAL(modifiedChanged(bool)),
01922                 actSave_, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01923 }

01925 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01926 // Function: openSystem()
01927 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01928 void MainWindow::openSystem(VLNV const& vlnv, bool forceUnlocked)
01929 {
01930     // Check if the system is already open and activate it.
01931     if (vlnv.isValid()) {
01932         for (int i = 0; i < designTabs_->count(); i++) {
01933             EndpointDesignWidget *designWidget = dynamic_cast<EndpointDesignWidget*>(designTabs_->widget(i));
01934 
01935             if (designWidget != 0 && *designWidget->getOpenDocument() == vlnv) {
01936                 designTabs_->setCurrentIndex(i);
01937                 return;
01938             }
01939         }
01940     }
01941 
01942     EndpointDesignWidget* designWidget = new EndpointDesignWidget(libraryHandler_, this, this);
01943 
01944     if (!designWidget->setDesign(vlnv))
01945     {
01946         delete designWidget;
01947         return;
01948     }
01949 
01950     if (forceUnlocked)
01951     {
01952         designWidget->setProtection(false);
01953     }
01954 
01955     designWidget->setTabWidget(designTabs_);
01956 
01957     connect(designWidget->getEditProvider(), SIGNAL(editStateChanged()), this, SLOT(updateMenuStrip()));
01958     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(updateMenuStrip()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01959     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(openComponent(const VLNV&)),
01960         this, SLOT(openComponent(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01961     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(openSource(ProgramEntityItem*)),
01962         this, SLOT(openSource(ProgramEntityItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01963 
01964     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(componentSelected(ComponentItem*)),
01965         this, SLOT(onComponentSelected(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01966     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(destroyed(QObject*)),
01967         this, SLOT(onClearItemSelection()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01968     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(clearItemSelection()),
01969         libraryHandler_, SLOT(onClearSelection()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01970     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(clearItemSelection()),
01971         this, SLOT(onClearItemSelection()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01972 
01973     //connect(designWidget->getEditProvider(), SIGNAL(editStateChanged()), this, SLOT(updateMenuStrip()));
01974     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(zoomChanged()), this, SLOT(updateZoomTools()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01975     connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(modeChanged(DrawMode)),
01976         this, SLOT(onDrawModeChanged(DrawMode)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01977         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(modifiedChanged(bool)),
01978                 actSave_, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01979 
01980     // A small hack to center the view correctly.
01981 //     designWidget->fitInView();
01982 //     designWidget->setZoomLevel(100);
01983 }

01985 void MainWindow::openComponent( const VLNV& vlnv, bool forceUnlocked ) {
01986 
01987         // Check if the component editor is already open and activate it.
01988         if (vlnv.isValid()) {
01989                 for (int i = 0; i < designTabs_->count(); i++) {
01990                         IPXactComponentEditor* editor = dynamic_cast<IPXactComponentEditor*>(designTabs_->widget(i));
01991 
01992                         if (editor && editor->getComponentVLNV() == vlnv) {
01993                                 designTabs_->setCurrentIndex(i);
01994                                 return;
01995                         }
01996                 }
01997         }
01998 
01999         // component editor was not yet open so create it
02000 
02001         QSharedPointer<Component> component;
02002 
02003         if (libraryHandler_->contains(vlnv)) {
02004                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = libraryHandler_->getModel(vlnv);
02005                 component = libComp.dynamicCast<Component>();
02006         }
02007         else {
02008                 emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in the library").arg(
02009                         vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
02010                         vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
02011                         vlnv.getName()).arg(
02012                         vlnv.getVersion()));
02013                 return;
02014         }
02015 
02016         if (!component) {
02017                 emit errorMessage(tr("Document type did not match Component"));
02018                 return;
02019         }
02020 
02021         QString filePath = libraryHandler_->getPath(vlnv);
02022         QFileInfo info(filePath);
02023 
02024         IPXactComponentEditor* editor = new IPXactComponentEditor(libraryHandler_, info, component, this);
02025         QString styleSheet("*[mandatoryField=\"true\"] { background-color: LemonChiffon; }");
02026         editor->setStyleSheet(styleSheet);
02027 
02028     if (forceUnlocked)
02029     {
02030         editor->setProtection(false);
02031     }
02032 
02033         editor->setTabWidget(designTabs_);
02034 
02035         connect(editor, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
02036                 console_, SLOT(onErrorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
02037         connect(editor, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
02038                 console_, SLOT(onNoticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
02039         connect(editor, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
02040                 this, SLOT(updateMenuStrip()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
02041         connect(editor, SIGNAL(modifiedChanged(bool)),
02042                 actSave_, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
02043 }

02045 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02046 // Function: changeProtection()
02047 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02048 void MainWindow::changeProtection(bool locked)
02049 {
02050     TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->currentWidget());
02051     Q_ASSERT(doc != 0);
02052     Q_ASSERT(doc->getComponentVLNV().isValid());
02053 
02054     if (doc == 0)
02055     {
02056         return;
02057     }
02058 
02059     if (locked)
02060     {
02061         if (doc->isModified())
02062         {
02063             QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
02064                                tr("The document has been modified. The changes need to be saved before the "
02065                                   "document can be locked. Save changes and continue?"),
02066                                QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, this);
02067 
02068             if (msgBox.exec() == QMessageBox::No || !doc->save())
02069             {
02070                 actProtect_->setChecked(false);
02071                 return;
02072             }
02073         }
02074                 // Lock/unlock the document.
02075                 doc->setProtection(locked);
02076     }
02077     else
02078     {
02079         // Check if there is a document with the same VLNV being edited (i.e. not unlocked).
02080         for (int i = 0; i < designTabs_->count(); i++)
02081         {
02082             TabDocument* otherDoc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(designTabs_->widget(i));
02083             Q_ASSERT(otherDoc != 0);
02084 
02085             if (!otherDoc->isProtected() && otherDoc->getComponentVLNV() == doc->getComponentVLNV())
02086             {
02087                 // If there was, inform the user that the document cannot be unlocked.
02088                 QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
02089                                    tr("The document cannot be unlocked because the component "
02090                                    "is being edited in another view."), QMessageBox::Ok, this);
02091                 msgBox.exec();
02092 
02093                 actProtect_->setChecked(true);
02094                 return;
02095             }
02096         }
02097 
02098                 QString message = tr("Are you sure you want to unlock the document?\n");
02099         QString detailMsg = "";
02100 
02101                 // if edited document was component 
02102                 VLNV vlnv = doc->getComponentVLNV();
02103                 if (vlnv.isValid() && libraryHandler_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::COMPONENT) {
02104 
02105                         // if component has been instantiated in other components then print
02106                         // a list of those components
02107                         QList<VLNV> list;
02108                         int refCount = libraryHandler_->getOwners(list, vlnv);
02109                         if (refCount > 0) {
02110                                 detailMsg += tr("The component has been instantiated in the following %1 component(s):\n").arg(refCount);
02111 
02112                                 foreach (VLNV owner, list) {
02113                                         detailMsg += "* " + owner.getVendor() + ":" + owner.getLibrary() + ":" +
02114                                                          owner.getName() + ":" + owner.getVersion() + "\n"; 
02115                                 }
02116 
02117                 message += tr("Changes to the document can affect %1 other documents.").arg(refCount);
02118                         }
02119             else
02120             {
02121                 message += tr("Changes to the document can affect other documents.");
02122             }
02123                 }
02124         else
02125         {
02126             message += tr("Changes to the document can affect other documents.");
02127         }
02128 
02129         // Ask verification from the user.
02130         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
02131                            message, QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, this);
02132         msgBox.setDetailedText(detailMsg);
02133 
02134         if (msgBox.exec() == QMessageBox::No)
02135         {
02136             actProtect_->setChecked(true);
02137             return;
02138         }
02139                 // Lock/unlock the document.
02140                 doc->setProtection(locked);
02141                 doc->refresh();
02142     }
02143 
02144         // if the tab is designWidget
02145         DesignWidget* designwidget = dynamic_cast<DesignWidget*>(doc);
02146         if (designwidget && designwidget->getHierComponent()->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_HW)
02147                 // update the editors to match the locked state
02148                 configurationEditor_->setLocked(locked);
02149         else
02150                 configurationEditor_->setLocked(true);
02151 
02152         // clear instance editor because the current instance is no longer valid
02153         instanceEditor_->clear();
02154 
02155         onProtectionChanged(locked);
02156 
02157     updateMenuStrip();
02158 }
02159 
02160 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02161 // Function: onProtectionChanged()
02162 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02163 void MainWindow::onProtectionChanged(bool locked)
02164 {
02165     if (locked)
02166     {
02167         actProtect_->setIcon(QIcon(":icons/graphics/protection-locked.png"));
02168         actProtect_->setText(tr("Locked"));
02169     }
02170     else
02171     {
02172         actProtect_->setIcon(QIcon(":icons/graphics/protection-unlocked.png"));
02173         actProtect_->setText(tr("Unlocked"));
02174     }
02175 }
