02203 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02204 // Function: createSWComponent()
02205 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02206 void MainWindow::createSWComponent(SWCreateType createType, VLNV const& vlnv,
02207                                    QString const& directory)
02208 {
02209     Q_ASSERT(vlnv.isValid());
02210 
02211     // Create a component.
02212     QSharedPointer<Component> component = QSharedPointer<Component>(new Component());
02213     component->setVlnv(vlnv);
02214 
02215     // Set Kactus attributes.
02216     component->setComponentImplementation(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW);
02217 
02218     if (createType == SW_CREATE_APPLICATION)
02219     {
02220         component->setComponentSWType(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION);
02221 
02222         // Add the fixed bus interface to the component.
02223         QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf(new BusInterface());
02224         busIf->setName("app_link");
02225         busIf->setInterfaceMode(General::MASTER);
02226         busIf->setBusType(VLNV(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, "Kactus", "internal", "app_link", "1.0"));
02227 
02228         component->addBusInterface(busIf);
02229     }
02230     else if (createType == SW_CREATE_ENDPOINTS)
02231     {
02232         component->setComponentSWType(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS);
02233 
02234         // Add the fixed bus interface to the component.
02235         QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf(new BusInterface());
02236         busIf->setName("app_link");
02237         busIf->setInterfaceMode(General::SLAVE);
02238         busIf->setBusType(VLNV(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, "Kactus", "internal", "app_link", "1.0"));
02239 
02240         component->addBusInterface(busIf);
02241     }
02242     else
02243     {
02244         component->setComponentSWType(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM);
02245     }
02246 
02247     // Create a design for the component if it is a platform stack.
02248     if (createType == SW_CREATE_PLATFORM_STACK)
02249     {
02250         VLNV designVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
02251                         vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".design", vlnv.getVersion());
02252 
02253         View* hierView = new View("kts_sw_ref");
02254         hierView->setHierarchyRef(designVLNV);
02255         hierView->addEnvIdentifier("");
02256 
02257         Model* model = new Model;
02258         model->addView(hierView);
02259         component->setModel(model);
02260 
02261         QSharedPointer<Design> design(new Design(designVLNV));
02262         libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, design);
02263     }
02264 
02265     // Create the file.
02266     libraryHandler_->writeModelToFile(directory, component);
02267 
02268     switch (createType)
02269     {
02270     case SW_CREATE_PLATFORM_COMPONENT:
02271     case SW_CREATE_APPLICATION:
02272     case SW_CREATE_ENDPOINTS:
02273         {
02274             openComponent(vlnv, true);
02275             break;
02276         }
02277 
02278     case SW_CREATE_PLATFORM_STACK:
02279         {
02280             openDesign(vlnv, "kts_sw_ref", true);
02281             break;
02282         }
02283     }
02284 }

02286 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02287 // Function: showAbout()
02288 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02289 void MainWindow::showAbout()
02290 {
02291     SplashScreen* splash = new SplashScreen(this);
02292         splash->setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose);
02293         splash->setWindowFlags(splash->windowFlags() & ~(Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint | Qt::X11BypassWindowManagerHint));
02294         splash->move(this->mapToGlobal(this->rect().center() - splash->rect().center()));
02295         splash->setWindowModality(Qt::ApplicationModal);
02296     splash->show();
02297     splash->showMessage(""); 
02298 }

02306 
02307 void MainWindow::displayDockedEditor( QWidget* dockedEditor ) {
02308         QWidget* parentDock = dockedEditor->parentWidget();
02309         QDockWidget* dock = qobject_cast<QDockWidget*>(parentDock);
02310         
02311         // if the editor's parent was not dock widget (editor is not dockable)
02312         if (!dock) {
02313                 return;
02314         }
02315         
02316         // find out if there are other docks tabified with the dock
02317         QList<QDockWidget*> tabifiedDocks = tabifiedDockWidgets(dock);
02318 
02319         // if there were no other docks tabified
02320         if (tabifiedDocks.isEmpty()) {
02321 
02322                 // get the are the editor belongs to
02323                 Qt::DockWidgetArea area = dockWidgetArea(dock);
02324                 // add dock widget to correct area
02325                 addDockWidget(area, dock);
02326                 dock->show();
02327         }
02328         // there were dock widgets tabified.
02329         else {
02330                 // move the dock on top of other widgets.
02331                 tabifyDockWidget(tabifiedDocks.first(), dock);
02332         }
02333 
02334 }
